channel.title: [Minimash] Community Forum Mafia 2 - (5/9/31) - Game Over - ModeShifter (Alice) Wins!
channel.description:
https://www.ptasocial.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/ptasocial-online-community.jpg
# [color=orange]Community Forum Mafia 2[/color]
<Small>Hosted by Small_Tank </small>
<Small>Reviewed by eevee, Arete, Firekitten</small>
# [color=orange]What's different?[/color]
All roles are custom made, and each card is based around one of the many users on this forum! You might even get lucky and roll yourself! The general power level of this is higher than ToL, so don't be afraid if you see a couple of busted classes.
In addition to this, occasionally I will host a special event.
Keep in mind, this isn't meant to be a competetive setup - It's more of meant to be high-powered role madness.
There will be at least 2 factions - Town and Mafia. No neutrals will have the fool/jester win condition. Unless they are orangeandblack5 or Icibalus flavored that is.
# [color=darkorange]Rules[/color] Standard Forum Rules Apply Standard Forum Matches Rules Apply Days are 36 Hours, Nights are 12 Hours. Don't angleshoot ( :eyes: ) Don't be a salty boi until the game is over, afterwards we can unleash all our salt. Don't post in big text
# [color=darkorange]Rolelist[/color] :scroll: ... Dammit, Firekitten ran off with my role list! Looks like we'll have to go without it!
# [color=darkorange]Player List[/color] :tangerine: [color=ligblue]1. ~~Vulgard~~ -> ~~N.1~~[/color] - **BANNED D2** [color=pink]2. Marshal[/color] - **BANNED N1** - **UNBANNED N2** [color=ligblue]3. Alice[/color] [color=pink]4. Hippoyeetus[/color] - **BANNED D1** - **UNBANNED D2** [color=ligblue]~~5. Geyde~~[/color] - Left the Forum EoD4 - [color]Chloe[/color] [color=pink]6. ~~PKR~~ ~~Zone_Q11~~[/color] - **BANNED D2** [color=ligblue]7. ~~Ami~~[/color] - Left the Forum D2 - [color]Napoleon[/color] [color=pink]~~8. DatBird~~[/color] - **BANNED N4** [color=pink]9. Techwolves[/color] ~~[color=pink]10. Napoleon[/color]~~ - Left the Forum D1 - [color=red]SirDerpsALot[/color] [color=ligblue]~~11. Nerbins~~[/color] - Left the Forum D3 - [color]Techwolves[/color] [color=pink]~~12. Frostwolf103~~[/color] - Left the Forum D3 - [color]clonedcheese[/color] ~~[color=pink]13. ~~Katze~~ -> Mist1422[/color]~~ - Left the Forum D1 - [color]DatBird[/color] ~~[color=ligblue]14. Clonedcheese[/color]~~ - Left the Forum D1 - [color]Sulit[/color] [color=pink]~~15. SirDerpsAlot~~[/color] - Left the forums D3 - [color]Geyde[/color] [color=pink]~~16. Italy~~[/color] - Left the Forum EoD2 - [color=red]MaximusPrime[/color] [color=pink]~~17. Simon~~[/color] - Left the Forum EoD3 - [color]Vulgard[/color] ~~[color=ligblue]18. Crichard[/color]~~ - **BANNED N2** [color=ligblue]19. ~~Chloe~~ -> ~~TrustworthyLiberal~~[/color] - Left the Forum D3 - [color]CRichard564[/color] [color=ligblue]20. ~~ModeShifter~~[/color] - Left the Forum EoD1 - [color]Italy[/color] [color=pink]~~21. An_gorta_pratai~~[/color] - Left the Forum D3 - [color]Apprentice[/color] [color=ligblue]22. ~~KyoDaz~~[/color] - **BANNED D2** [color=pink]23. ~~Icibalus~~ -> ~~Blizer~~[/color] - Left the Forum N4 - [color]Centuries[/color] [color=ligblue]24. ~~MaximusPrime~~[/color] - Left the Forum D4 - [color]Hippoyeetus[/color] [color=ligblue]25. Leafia[/color] [color=ligblue]26. ~~oB_L1ght~~[/color] - **BANNED D2** [color=ligblue]27. ~~Centuries~~[/color] - **BANNED D2** [color=ligblue]28. ~~Moleland~~ -> Mist[/color] [color=ligblue]29. ~~Solic~~[/color] - Left the Forum N4 - [color]Leafia[/color] [color=pink]30. ~~Sulit~~[/color] - **BANNED D3** [color=pink]31. Apprentice[/color] 32. Battery-powered toaster with wings 33.~~A tree different coloured pencil sharpeners~~ - **BANNED N4** 34. ~~Arete the BOT~~ - **BANNED N4** 35. ~~Sentence below me is true~~ - Left the forum D2 36. ~~Sentence above me is false~~ - **BANNED N4** 37. ~~Ikoria: Lair of Behemoths~~ - **BANNED N4** 38. ~~Annoying Spam Emails~~ - **BANNED N5** 39. RTing your greencheck by claiming a redcheck on them 40. ~~woweeflip~~ - **BANNED N4** 41. Litten 42. boom bye scum

like

item.title: [Minimash] Community Forum Mafia 2 - (5/9/31) - Game Over - ModeShifter (Alice) Wins!
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
If I killed alice I knew I lost

it would flat out be 3v2 maf vs town

so I decided to hope either

A, tech could kill a bot / stop alice

B, Mafia could kill a bot and was lying saying they couldn’t

C, alice was, somehow, a FPSing villager

Read full topic
